text: Nocardiopsis algeriensis is an alkalitolerant bacterium from the genus of Nocardiopsis which has been isolate from saharan soil from the Adrar Province in Algeria. == References == ==External links== *Type strain of Nocardiopsis algeriensis at BacDive - the Bacterial Diversity Metadatabase Category:Actinomycetales Category:Bacteria described in 2015
title: Nocardiopsis algeriensis
